arcs.headline: Docs and Playground are now one
arcs.summary: We've merged the standalone documentation directly into the Play page. The new 'Integrate' section allows developers to generate and copy live API requests for any model without leaving the creative workflow.

arcs.headline: New roleplay models & smarter Gemini
arcs.summary: We introduced `qwen-character` for immersive roleplay and lowered pricing for Airforce-powered generation. Additionally, Gemini models now offer better visibility into reasoning steps and native code execution.

arcs.headline: Polly gets an independent voice
arcs.summary: Polly's core logic has been upgraded to support more authentic, independent thinking. This update creates more natural conversations while simultaneously hardening security against prompt injection.

one_liner: Docs meet the Playground, Polly gets smarter, and we've added specialized models for roleplay.
